# import module we'll need to import our custom module
from shutil import copyfile

# copy our file into the working directory (make sure it has .py suffix)
copyfile(src = "../input/detect-outlier-py/get_all_outlier_py.py", 
         dst = "../working/get_all_outlier_py.py")

from get_all_outlier_py import *
source.52e02cd7:
iris = pd.read_csv("../input/iris/Iris.csv")
outlierIndex = getAllOutlerData(iris,verbose=True)
print("Toal outlierIndex = " , outlierIndex)
print("Toal outlier lenght = " , len(outlierIndex))
print("Toal outlier percent = " , round((100 * len(outlierIndex)/len(iris)),2) ,"%")
iris.loc[outlierIndex]
